item.title: Blog: Getting my Security+ without the reccomended experience
item.description: After failing my driving test in November 2020 and unable to take more lessons due to the COVID lockdown I wanted something I could strive towards and attain in the time I found myself isolated. On a hunch I looked up the CompTIA Security+ a certification I regularly saw mentioned in online InfoSec spaces. To my surprise I found a video course from Total Seminars on sale on Udemy, and decided to take the plunge.
